description.displayText: Simonea is what we were looking for. She is a good person. She is a loving baby sitter (and mom too). She knows what to do in every situation and she takes care of other things, even when we do not ask her for. She has always a very positive attitude and she is very reliable, and punctual. She helps us out with the pick ups and also babysit both of my kids who are 6 year old and 18 months). We are very happy with her and my kids too! I really recommend her.
